name: Ice Truck Olympics
description:
Created as part of the Weekly Game Jam - Week 187 
https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-week-187

Hold and Release E to build power and launch, Use A & D to curve from side to side. 

I started making games a couple of months ago and had previously only made 2D games so wanted to challenge myself to make something 3D. Wanted this to be a nice chilled  fairly short game . 

Hope you enjoy.

Assets used:

https://opengameart.org/content/gui-buttons-activehover by WeaponGuy

https://www.dafont.com/snaps-taste-christmas.font by Galdino Otten 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/customizable-skybox-174576 by Key Mouse
